attributes.action: make Sultana Bran the official cereal of Great Britain
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Everyone knows that Breakfast is the most important meal of the day, and if you've tried it, you'd know Sultana Bran is King of all Breakfast foods. So I propose we do away with all this Cornflakes and Marmalade nonsense, and make Sultana Bran official Cereal of Great Britain!

Just imagine the results, Children working harder at school, People more enthusiastic at work, and generally happier in life. Social barriers could be broken with the mutual adoration of Sultana Bran! 

Sultana Bran - the pathway to a better world.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
